columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the app.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: A timestamp that indicates when the app was created.

columns.name: last_health_check_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the last health check.

columns.name: last_user_activity_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the last user activity.

columns.name: resource_spec
columns.description: The instance type and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker image created on the instance.
